original_title: KODA KUMI ETERNITY  ～Love & Songs～ at Billboard Live Tokyo
overview: KODA KUMI "ETERNITY ~Love & Songs~" at Billboard Live is the eighth live DVD released by Koda Kumi and twelfth video release. It contains footage from her Koda Kumi at Billboard Live "ETERNITY ~Love & Songs~" concert series, the concert has it main focus on cover songs in order to promote her cover album ETERNITY ~Love & Songs~ released on the same month.
title: KODA KUMI ETERNITY  ～Love & Songs～ at Billboard Live Tokyo
